text: ever since i enrolled my girl to this school she has been telling me how fun it has been, i have never seen her happier. The teachers treat her with lots of TLC and also are genuine in her development and growth. Love how sincere the teachers are! thank you lfp for the love you have showed us and my girl! ❤️❤️
My child enjoys coming to school everyday. Teachers and principal are very attentive to my child’s well being. Highly recommended.

I explored a lot of schools in this area, this came up as a great choice. I like the environment and energy in the classroom, Teacher Dhivya, Laoshi, the principal- all teachers are doing their wonderful best to take care of the kids in the best way. My daughter has food allergies and bronchitis, and the way the teachers handle and take precautions and keep me updated is commendable. The school
has many excursions , drama and art programs and celebrations for parents/kids. Will highly recommend.

My son finds joy learning in Little footprint Depot Road as the curriculum is play-based and educational. Thanks to Teacher Shannon and Teacher Pat for settling him in school and guiding him in a progressive way.

Thank you to Ms Lorrita and her team of dedicated teachers in looking after my boy. The daily updates in school are very prompt and they have many activities for the infants, including opportunities for parents to get involved for celebrations etc.
